harp module¶

class harp.MainWindow(app)¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QMainWindow

Class to provide the GUI end of HARP.

Extends the QMainWindow class (from mainwindow.py) generated by QT Designer

Allows the user to setup a paramater file in the first table and lets the user view the processing in the second tab.

QT Designer automatically uses mixed case for its class object names e.g radioButton. This format is not PEP8 but has not been changed.

Constructor: Checks the buttons which have been pressed and responds accordingly.

NOTE: Sphinx does not process variables and parameters nicely for _init_ functions. Not clear how to show this info in documentation page.

:param app :ivar ui: ui_class :ivar modality: str - Changes based on the modality chosen. Value should be either ‘MicroCT’ or ‘OPT’ :ivar stop: boolean - If True HARP stops pre-processing steps. Wont let the user go process the recon :ivar stop_pro_switch: int - If value 1 HARP stops processes due to user pressing stop :ivar count_in: int - Count used for processing table. Initialized at 0 :ivar current_row: int - Row for processing table. Initialized at 0 :ivar scan_folder: str - Scan path. Initialized as ‘’ to indicate no data :ivar recon_log_path: str - Recon log path. Initialized as ‘’ to indicate no data :ivar f_size_out_gb: str - File size (in GB). Initialized as ‘’ to indicate no data :ivar pixel_size: str - Pixel size. Initialized as ‘’ to indicate no data

about_message()¶

Short description about what HARP is and its version

add_more()¶

When the add more button is pressed, just go back to the first tab

add_to_list()¶

This will set off all the processing scripts and shows the dialog box to keep track of progress

add_to_list_action()¶
autofill_pipe(suppress=False)¶
change_opt_chn()¶
choose_channel_for_crop(event)¶

If the return button is pressed on a certain row of the opt list this recon will be used for the automatic crop

closeEvent(event)¶

Function for when the program has been closed down Function name has to be mixed case format as it is from qt Performs a loop through the item list and checks if any process still running

crop_call_back(box)¶

Method to get crop dimension text (used in getDimensions)

crop_switch()¶

turns crop options on or off depending on the status of the check

delete_rows(event)¶

If the delete button is pressed on a certain row the recon is taken off the list to be processed

derive_on()¶
dragEnterEvent(event)¶

Handles drag section for drag and drop of folders.

Overrides dragEnterEvent method from the QMainWindow. Required for drag and drop.

Parameters:event – qt drag event)

See also

dropEvent()

dropEvent(event)¶

Handles drop section for drag and drop of folders.

Overrides dropEvent method from the QMainWindow. Resets the inputs and auto-fills in the relevant parameter information.

Requires dragEnterEvent method.

Parameters:event – qt drop event)

See also

reset_inputs(), autofill_pipe()

example_data()¶

loads in data for tesing purposes

get_OPT_only()¶

edits self.modality

get_SPR_man()¶

Get the SPR file manually

get_dimensions()¶

Perform a z projection which allows user to crop based on z projection. Two important files used. crop.py and zproject.py zproject peforms the zprojection and displays the image. crop.py then gets the dimensions to perform the crop NOTE: The cropping is not actually done here

get_recon_man()¶

Get the recon folder manually

get_scan_man()¶

Get the scan folder manually

get_uCT_only()¶

edits self.modality

input_folder_changed(text)¶

When user changes the name of the folder manually

kill_em_all()¶

Function to kill all processes

man_crop_off()¶

disables boxes for cropping manually

man_crop_on()¶

enables boxes for cropping manually

output_folder_changed(text)¶

When user changes the name of the folder manually

processing_slot(message)¶

This listens to the child process and displays any messages. It has records the start and stop time of the processing and starts a new thread after the processing has finished

reset_inputs()¶

Reset the inputs to blank

reset_screen()¶

Reset screen back to default

resize_screen()¶

Resize screen for smaller monitors

run_crop(img_path)¶

Method to create Crop object (used in getDimensions)

scale_by_pixel_on()¶

enables boxes for scaling by pixel

select_file_in()¶

User selects the folder to be processed and some auto-fill methods are carried out

select_file_out()¶

Select output folder

start_processing()¶

Starts a thread for processing after the user has pressed the ‘start button’ (GUI click only)

start_processing_thread()¶

starts a thread to perform all the processing in the background. The add function then listens to any messages the thread makes

start_z_thread()¶

starts a thread to perform all the processing in the background.

stop_processing()¶

Stop processing, kill the current process

tab_change()¶

Changes the tab view for the user.

On tab 0 (parameters) the qt KeyPressEvent is required for choosing the crop channel for OPT. On tab 1 (processing) the KeyPressEvent is used for deleting rows on the processing table.

They KeyPressEvent is therefore updated depending on what tab the user is on.

Also updates the OPT channels table each tab-change in-case anything has changed.

See also

choose_channel_for_crop(), delete_rows()

update_name()¶

Function to update the name of the file and folder

user_guide()¶

Loads up pdf help file

zproject_slot(message)¶

This listens to the child process and displays any messages. It has records the start and stop time of the processing and starts a new thread after the processing has finished
